abstract: The oil exploration company confirmed the sale on Monday, which includes access to the untapped Jubilee oil field off the West African nation’s coast.
snippet: The oil exploration company confirmed the sale on Monday, which includes access to the untapped Jubilee oil field off the West African nation’s coast.
lead_paragraph: Kosmos Energy, an oil explorer backed by private equity firms, confirmed on Monday that it had agreed to sell assets in Ghana to the Exxon Mobil Corporation.

headline.main: Kosmos Confirms Sale of Oil Stake
headline.print_headline: Kosmos Confirms Sale of Oil Stake

abstract: Kosmos Energy, an oil explorer backed by the Blackstone Group and Warburg Pincus, confirmed on Monday that it had agreed to sell assets in Ghana to the Exxon Mobil.
snippet: Kosmos Energy, an oil explorer backed by the Blackstone Group and Warburg Pincus, confirmed on Monday that it had agreed to sell assets in Ghana to the Exxon Mobil.
lead_paragraph: Kosmos Energy, an oil explorer backed by the Blackstone Group and Warburg Pincus, confirmed on Monday that it had agreed to sell assets in Ghana to the Exxon Mobil Corporation.

headline.main: Kosmos Energy Confirms Sale of Ghana Oil Stake
